Package org.netgene.ga

Class GeneticConfiguration

java.lang.Object
org.netgene.ga.GeneticConfiguration
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable
public final class GeneticConfiguration extends Object implements Serializable
This class can be used to incrementally construct a GeneticAlgorithm.
See Also:
Serialized Form
